card.text: (Exile the top card of your library face-up. At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, you may put an incited card you own into your hand.)

card.text: When Adept Blacksmith or another nontoken creature enters under your control, you may attach an unattached Weapon you control to it. If you control no unattached Weapons, create a Weapon token first. (It's an artifact Equipment with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and "Equip {2}".)

card.text: Whenever Blackmarket Dealer or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains haste until end of turn.
